setting up the table for when everyone is ready to eat .

output.sentences: The kids were hosting a party for friends.
They fixed the table setting and got ready.
They were playing in the yard, having fun.
Swinging was her favorite way to pass the time.
They went to sleep, dreaming of the fun they had that day.
